item.title: CVE-2021-25016|2024-08-03T19:49:14.553Z -- unknown -- floating%20chat%20widget%3A%20contact%20icons%2C%20messages%2C%20telegram%2C%20email%2C%20sms%2C%20call%20button%20%E2%80%93%20chaty
item.description: The Chaty WordPress plugin before 2.8.3 and Chaty Pro WordPress plugin before 2.8.2 do not sanitise and escape the search parameter before outputting it back in the admin dashboard, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
